--- Pacifix ---

Pacifix is torn between not wanting the situation to dissolve into 
fighting and the desire to save his friend and ally. Acting quickly, 
he opens a broadband commlink with a somewhat short range, though 
long enough for it's purpose, "Unknown bots! Identify yourselves. 
What are doing with and where are you taking my friends?" He shouts 
at Grimlock, having closed the comm, "Grimlock, hold your fire, till 
I say you may shoot."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill came to the grim realization, but he was to slow, "No, 
come
> back with Cliffjumper." he screamed, quickly jumping into the air, 
then
> turning his body to land on his stomach. Instead of landing though, 
he
> transformed, and landed on already reved wheels, as he peeled out as
> fast as he could, following the captors. 
> 
> Grimlock pulled himself up, and saw Strafe being kidnapped. "Grrr, 
no
> Autobot taken prisoner while Grimlock in charge, NO." he yelled, and
> didnt wait for permission from Pacifix, as he launched himself into 
the
> air, like a bombastic missile, following the Obeytis ship.
